com.facebook.buck.testutil.integration

Class DebuggableTemporaryFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • org.junit.rules.TemporaryFolder
        • com.facebook.buck.testutil.integration.DebuggableTemporaryFolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestRule

    public class DebuggableTemporaryFolder
extends TemporaryFolder
    Subclass of TemporaryFolder that optionally keeps the contents of the tmp around after the test has finished. This is often useful when debugging a failed integration test.

    Here is an example of how to create a DebuggableTemporaryFolder that will not delete itself on exit in an integration test: 

     @Rule
 public DebuggableTemporaryFolder tmp = new DebuggableTemporaryFolder().doNotDeleteOnExit();
